description:
AJKI-09 EMBROIDERED TWILL 3 PC

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Self Twill Trouser: Self Twill Shawl: Self Twill Color: Brown

Experience the essence of a blooming garden with this brown ensemble, a garden of earthy elegance. The quintessentially embroidered shirt features threadwork in coral, green, and beige hues creating a rich tapestry of floral beauty. The sophisticatedly embroidered shawl, featuring a diagonal embroidery pattern, enhances the entire look with a sense of movement and grace, perfectly capturing the spirit of winter.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on self twill
Embroidered back center panel on self twill
12 embroidered kalis for front & back on self twill
2.5-meter embroidered ghera border for front & back daman on self twill
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on self twill
Embroidered shawl with 4-side border on self twill
1.5-meter wide-width self twill for trouser
Embroidered border for trouser on self twill
